alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; Upper Hood River Valley; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 6:56AM PDT until April 13 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow above 500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1 inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Oregon and southwest Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Roads below 500 feet in elevation should remain mostly wet, or perhaps briefly slushy in some outlying areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; Upper Hood River Valley; Western Columbia River Gorge
